title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The documentation in Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting, but the current behavior does not reflect this.
OB: Currently, when accessing the Reload link in the reference Servlet application deployed as cookiename.war on http://localhost:8080/cookiename/, the URL generated includes the default 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name.
EB: Expected result: If the phrase in section 7.1.1 is to be followed, I would expect the Reload link URL to be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached cookiename.war file. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/ and click on the Reload link.
